interestingcomments.content: Hi all. Having started this idea I'm not sure if I can organise things as my wife isn't well and things are a bit up in the air. If anyone wants to try to get something together I will see if I can attend

interestingcomments.content: He isn't THAT busy. He's probably lost it ! Can happen to anyone. Give him a break. --img--  Being busy is one thing. Dodging communications or stringing someone along are not acceptable, however. If he lost it, then he should just say so. If not, provide a timely status or offer to send the lens back as-is.
